item.title: Changing the DirectAccess and Web Application Proxy external certificate
item.description: In my lab I have a gateway server that is responsible for both DirectAccess and RD Gateway operations. Since I only have one external IP, I sit behind a NAT (or two). In order to be able to do both DirectAccess (DA) and RD Gateway (RDG), I need to use the Web Application Proxy (WAP) feature from Server 2012 R2’s Remote Access role.
